questions.question: During development of mine, operating points should preferably lie___________

answers.a: Left of the peak of the efficiency curve
answers.b: Right of the peak of the efficiency curve
answers.c: Above of the peak of efficiency curve
answers.d: Independent of the condition of mine

questions.question: Which of the following statement is incorrect?

answers.a: Operating point must lie right to the stall point for better performance of fan
answers.b: Operating point must lie left to the stall point for better performance of fan
answers.c: Stall point is the point of reverse flexure
answers.d: At stall point, fluctuations of air velocity of fan occur

questions.question: If the impeller diameter of fan and air density is assumed to be constant and n is rotational speed of fan, P is fan drift pressure. Which of the following is correct?
For varying impeller diameter of a fan but with constant speed and air density

answers.a: Quantity varies as the cube of the impeller diameter
answers.b: Pressure varies as the square of the impeller diameter
answers.c: Power varies as the fifth power of the impeller diameter

questions.question: Air flow of a fan do not depend on________

answers.a: Efficiency x Input power of fan
